title: Corner Table, one of a pair
description: corner table, one of a pair; Sheraton design; decoration consists of lines of satinwood inlay on top edges on apron and legs - where husk ornament appears;  inlaid panels on rear legs; N.B. Said by Lyon to have been bought and made probably in Baltimore
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
